DOC.brief_title: Study Tetanus Toxoid , Reduced Diphtheria Toxoid , Acellular Pertussis Vaccine Adsorbed Healthy Subjects
DOC.detailed_description: All subject receive single dose vaccine , assess immunogenicity baseline ( pre-vaccination ) 30 day post-vaccination . They also monitor safety day vaccination Day 180 post-vaccination .
